ShapeFactory.summary: The ShapeFactory class. Contains methods for getting a collection of geometrical shapes.

Shapes.value: Gets or sets a collection of geometrical shapes.

GetShapes.summary: Gets a collection of geometrical shapes from a string containing parameters of shapes.
GetShapes.param: A text string containing parameters of geometrical shapes.

GetEqualShapes.summary: Gets a collection of shapes from the given source collection that are equal to the shape.
GetEqualShapes.param: The shape to be compared with.
GetEqualShapes.returns: A list of shapes that are equal to the shape.

Circle.summary: The Circle class. Contains methods for calculating perimeter and area of a circle.

remarks.para: This class derives from the Shape base class.

Radius.value: Gets or sets the radius of the circle.

GetPerimeter.summary: Calculates the circumference of the circle.
GetPerimeter.exception: Trown when the Radius property is negative.

GetArea.summary: Calculates the area of the circle.
GetArea.exception: Trown when the Radius property is negative.

ToString.returns: A string that presents the current circle.

Equals.summary: Overrides the base Equals() method. Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current pentagon.
Equals.param: The object to compare with the current circle.
Equals.returns: True if the specified object is equal to the current circle; otherwise, false.

GetHashCode.summary: Overrides the base GetHashCode() method. Serves as the customized hash function.
GetHashCode.returns: A hash code for the current circle.

Pentagon.summary: The Pentagon class. Contains methods for calculating perimeter and area of a pentagon.

remarks.para: This class derives from the Shape base class.

Side.value: Gets or sets a side length of the regular pentagon.

GetPerimeter.summary: Calculates the perimeter of the pentagon.
GetPerimeter.exception: Trown when the Side property is negative.

GetArea.summary: Calculates the area of the pentagon.
GetArea.exception: Trown when the Side property is negative.

ToString.returns: A string that presents the current pentagon.

Equals.summary: Overrides the base Equals() method. Determines whether the specified object is equal to the current pentagon.
Equals.param: The object to compare with the current pentagon.
Equals.returns: True if the specified object is equal to the current pentagon; otherwise, false.

GetHashCode.summary: Overrides the base GetHashCode() method. Serves as the customized hash function.
GetHashCode.returns: A hash code for the current pentagon.
